# Reluctant Apprentice (Trait)
## Overview
**Reluctant Apprentice:** Your early training grants you knowledge of the arcane. You gain a +1 trait bonus on [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] (arcana) checks, and are considered trained in that skill even if you have no ranks in it.

**Source:** Ultimate Campaign, pg. 58
